Text: Ma la mʼakpati O̩jo̩ le̩ du wʼeje-fu, oñ ma mʼu du gugu alumeji unyabo ki Defid fa tod uwñ le̩. Taku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa jʼo̩gba O̩jo̩.
Tak e̩gba ki Defid fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ le̩ che kpa, i de̩nyo̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ ef odu Jihofa.
Tak i fʼodukulu uje̩wñ kpʼo̩kpo̩ e̩laʼka kpʼe̩bo̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩maʼka kpe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ Israe̩l okoke du, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩.
Tak i chi abo Lifai iche̩ka ku ma jʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa ache e̩wñ, ku ma je̩ ñw ma rewa, ku ma gogbo̩do̩, ku ma ño̩ je̩nyu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l.

Esaf chʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼoji dufu, aro̩ne-wñ la che Ze̩karaya, Jeaye̩l kpai She̩maira-mo̩t kpai Jehaie̩l kpai Matatiya kpai E̩liab kpai Be̩naya kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m, kpai Jeaye̩l, ama nʼubo̩ kpʼumolo; Esaf la nʼoke egwu.
Oñ Be̩naya kpai Jahezie̩l amatama le̩, nʼo̩kakachi afa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ o̩gba akpati alo O̩jo̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ le̩ Defid dʼegogbodo̩ Jihofa lʼo̩wo̩ Esaf kpʼamo̩maye-wñ nyane̩ ejodudu:
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, me̩ kwadʼodu-wñ,
Me̩ fʼeli ko̩ ñw u, me̩ kʼeli dʼo̩,
Me̩ je̩nyʼodu-wñ kiafo̩ le̩;
Me̩ tene Jihofa kpʼukpahiu-wñ,
Me̩ dibetʼuko̩lo̩ awuwu-wñ kʼi che,
O ame̩ ugbe̩ Israe̩l, adu-wñ le̩,
Owñ che Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa;
Me̩ dibekado alo-wñ e̩gba du,
e-kʼi kpe̩ kpʼEbraham,
kʼi la fʼu lonyane̩ ñw Jeko̩b kʼi mud e̩wñ uhio̩me̩,
i kakini, Uwe̩ oñ nadʼane̩ Kenan ñw u,
E̩gba kʼaluka-ma de̩ re,
ku ma tale kwʼugbo abo uche̩ichi tʼugbo abo uche̩ichi omune̩,
i je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du che ma e̩bie̩ne̩ n;
kakini, Me̩ ki do̩wo̩kado abo kʼu fʼekpo ba tʼuma oji-i n,
Me̩ keli Jihofa, ane̩ ile̩-i du!
Me̩ dʼojima-wñ ka dufu ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Todu Jihofa tabale, i dukpe̩ ku ma je̩nyʼu ololololo,
Todu amo̩jo̩ amone̩ du chʼo̩wai ode;
E̩gahi kpʼojima jʼo̩gba-wñ;
Me̩ du ñw Jihofa, ame̩ o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amone̩,
Me̩ dʼojima ki chʼukpe̩ odu-wñ ñw Jihofa;
o̩la-me̩ ki ga o̩gba-wñ, ane̩-ile̩-i du;
Efojale ki nayo̩, ane̩-ile̩ ki la gwoguyo̩,
Ohimini abadi ki chekuku, kpʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ,
Tak oli efoko akeli uyo̩
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu e̩ne̩nyo̩ i che;
Me̩ ki la ka kakini,
Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ki nele,
Oñ i tʼEsaf kpʼamo̩maye-wñ no̩ jʼo̩gba akpati alo Jihofa o̩mo̩, ku ma che e̩wñ o̩gba akpati le̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, alu ki dukpe̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ du;
kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m manyʼamo̩maye-ma, ma chʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩jo̩; kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m o̩ma Je̩dutun kpai Hosa ku ma chʼamade o̩na;
kpai Zedo̩k atama kpai amo̩maye-wñ amatama ge̩, o̩gba unyabo Jihofa oj otete kʼi de̩ Gibeo̩n,
ku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa che ñwu Jihofa odudu kpai ane̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, ku ma cho teju alu du ku ma ko̩ tef uko̩-o̩la Jihofa, e-kʼi ñwa ñw abo Israe̩l;
Hi man kpai Je̩dutun kpʼabubo abo ku ma chi ku ma dʼodu-ma okoke le̩ ku ma gogbodo̩ Jihofa todabu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ chʼo̩gbegbele̩.
Himan kpai Je̩dutun nʼo̩kakachi kpai o̩ke tod abo ku ma anu, kpai e̩wñ iya tod eli O̩jo̩ manyu ma. Amo̩ma Je̩dutun la jo̩ alaku.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka kwʼo̩mo̩; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼunyi-wñ; Defid la mudabi kʼi kadua ñw abunyi-wñ.
